parameters.name: AuditStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the security audit feature. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: AuthStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether DSC is authorized to access the data asset.

*   **0**: no
*   **1**: yes

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh_cn**: Simplified Chinese (default)
*   **en_us**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The name of the service to which the data asset to query belongs. Valid values: **MaxCompute, OSS, ADS, OTS, and RDS**.

parameters.name: ProductId
parameters.description:
The ID of the service to which the asset belongs. Valid values:

*   **1**: MaxCompute
*   **2**: Object Storage Service (OSS)
*   **3**: AnalyticDB for MySQL
*   **4**: Tablestore (OTS)
*   **5**: ApsaraDB RDS
*   **6**: self-managed databases

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The content based on which a fuzzy search is performed.

parameters.name: SearchType
parameters.description:
The data asset type based on which a fuzzy search is performed.

*   **InstanceId**: the ID of the instance.
*   **InstanceName**: the name of the instance.
*   **DatabaseName**: the name of the database.

parameters.name: ServiceRegionId
parameters.description: The region in which the data asset resides. For more information, see [Supported regions](~~214257~~).
